    • Method Detail

      • drawMap

        public static void drawMap(MapInfoView map,
                           KillShotTrack killShotTrack)
        Method to draw the map in cli, it elaborates all the tiles of the map to print the correct ascii string
        Parameters:
        map - the map to print
        killShotTrack - the killshot track related to the map

      • printKS

        private static void printKS(KillShotTrack killShotTrack)
        Method to print the right number of skulls in relation of a killshot track. Ascii coded are used.
        Parameters:
        killShotTrack - the killshot track to print

      • elaborateTile

        private static void elaborateTile(TileView t,
                                  int i)
        This method take a tile and the row in which it is placed to draw it. It elaborates every direction to get if a door, a wall, another room or the same room is present in that direction and draw the related ascii symbol with the correct color
        Parameters:
        t - the tile to print
        i - the row of the tile

      • elaboratePlayers

        private static java.lang.String elaboratePlayers(java.util.List<PlayerView> players)
        Method to print the players in the map. Represented by circle in the color of the player.
        Parameters:
        players - the players to draw
        Returns:
        the string to print to draw players
